attributes.action: I would ask MPs to accept the new Brexit deal and end this ongoing uncertainty
attributes.additional_details: Businesses  and the government are having to spend billions of Pounds preparing for a no deal Brexit time after time and are halting investment as a result.
attributes.background:
For over 3 years Brexit has deeply divided the UK as MPs and the public can’t decided a way forward.

The only way out of this is a compromise in the form of the latest EU/UK deal. The only alternative is another delay, no deal or another referendum. The UK needs to move on and look to the future.
